00017 // Emulate boost::filesystem a little :)
00018 namespace x2d {
00019 namespace filesystem {
00020     
00024     template<class _CharType, _CharType _SEP>
00025     class basic_path 
00026     {
00027     public:
00028         typedef std::basic_string<_CharType> _StringType;
00029         typedef basic_path<_CharType, _SEP> path_type;
00030 
00035         basic_path(const _StringType& p) 
00036         : path_(p)
00037         { 
00038         }
00039         
00044         basic_path(const _CharType bytes[]) 
00045         : path_(bytes)
00046         { 
00047         }               
00048         
00052         basic_path() 
00053         : path_()
00054         { 
00055         }
00056         
00060         friend const path_type operator /(const path_type& p, const path_type& pp) 
00061         { 
00062             if(p.path_.empty())
00063             {
00064                 return pp;
00065             }
00066 
00067             if(pp.path_.empty())
00068             {
00069                 return p;
00070             }
00071             
00072             if(*p.path_.rbegin() == _SEP && *pp.path_.begin() == _SEP)
00073             {
00074                 return path_type(p.path_.substr(0, p.path_.size()-1) + pp.path_);
00075             }
00076             
00077             if(*p.path_.rbegin() == _SEP || *pp.path_.begin() == _SEP)
00078             {
00079                 return path_type(p.path_ + pp.path_);
00080             }
00081             
00082             return path_type(p.path_ + _SEP + pp.path_);                                
00083         }
00084         
00085         const bool operator <(const path_type& p) const
00086         {
00087             return string() < p.string();
00088         }
00089         
00094         const _StringType last_path_component() const 
00095         {
00096             size_t p = path_.rfind(_SEP);
00097             return path_.substr(p?p+1:p);
00098         }
00099 
00104         const path_type remove_last_path_component() const 
00105         {
00106             size_t p = path_.rfind(_SEP);
00107             return path_type( path_.substr(0,p) );
00108         }
00109         
00114         inline const _StringType string() const 
00115         { 
00116             return path_; 
00117         }
00118         
00119     private:        
00120         _StringType     path_;  // String representation of the path
00121     };
00122     
00123     // File type
00124     typedef enum {
00125         type_undef = 0,
00126         type_file,
00127         type_dir,
00128     } file_type;    
00129     
00133     template<class _PathType>
00134     class fs_obj_base 
00135     {                   
00136     public:                     
00137         virtual const file_type type() const = 0;
00138         virtual const _PathType path() const = 0;
00139         virtual boost::shared_ptr<fs_obj_base<_PathType> > next() = 0;
00140     };                  
00141     
00145     template<class _PathType>
00146     class basic_directory_iterator 
00147     : public std::iterator<std::input_iterator_tag, _PathType&, void, _PathType&, void>
00148     {                   
00149         
00150     public:
00151         typedef _PathType path_type;
00152         typedef boost::shared_ptr<fs_obj_base<_PathType> > fs_obj_ptr;                  
00153         
00154         // System access                
00155         static fs_obj_ptr open_path( const path_type& p );                                      
00156         static fs_obj_ptr next_object( fs_obj_ptr fso );                                                                        
00157         
00158         basic_directory_iterator( const _PathType& p )                  
00159         : initial_fs_obj_( open_path(p) )  // Try to open the path
00160         , fs_obj_(next_object(initial_fs_obj_))
00161         , base_path_( p )
00162         { 
00163         }
00164         
00165         // Basically the END of iterations
00166         basic_directory_iterator()
00167         : initial_fs_obj_() // Null dir
00168         , fs_obj_() 
00169         , base_path_()
00170         { 
00171         }
00172         
00173         // Iterator ++
00174         void operator ++() 
00175         {                       
00176             // Try to lookup and if null it will exit
00177             fs_obj_ = next_object(initial_fs_obj_);
00178         }
00179         
00180         bool operator !=(const basic_directory_iterator<_PathType>& it)
00181         {
00182             return this->fs_obj_ != it.fs_obj_;
00183         }                       
00184         
00185         const basic_directory_iterator<_PathType>* const operator->()
00186         {
00187             return this;
00188         }               
00189         
00190         // Get status
00191         const file_type status() const 
00192         { 
00193             return this->fs_obj_->type(); 
00194         }
00195         
00196         const typename _PathType::_StringType leaf() const 
00197         {
00198             return this->fs_obj_->path().last_path_component();
00199         }
00200         
00201         const typename _PathType::_StringType path() const 
00202         {
00203             return base_path_.string();
00204         }
00205         
00206     private:
00207         
00208         file_type  ftype_;
00209         fs_obj_ptr initial_fs_obj_, fs_obj_;
00210         const _PathType base_path_;
00211     };
00212     
00213     inline bool is_directory(file_type t)
00214     {
00215         return t == type_dir;
00216     }

00220     class ifd_basic_stream;
